item.title: [SRL] Powerminer
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

hardcore007:

^^ ive had lvl 3 for aleast 2months its a certain secret way i dont get banned or maybe its just luck?

Rule #4. Cherish your players. - Don't use Lvl-3 'mules'. That is very disrespectful and utterly stupid. Lvl-3 'mules' have "BAN ME" written all over their default face. Treat your players with respect, treat them as individuals. They are your Army, they work for you. Don't leave them unattended. Level them up. Switch scripts. Don't rape 'm... Play legit with them once and a while. If you manage to archieve an outstanding ranking (81+) on one of them, QUIT autoing on that particular Player. He has become to valuable.

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL] Powerminer
item.dc:creator: @Bego Bego
item.description:
@Bego wrote:

[center][size=7]SRL Powerminer
By Bego[/size][/center]

I might as well start out with a Wizzup type entrance… I made this because all powerminers (not even wizzups) worked for me (sorry Wizzup :P). This one works fine for me, and has all the antirandoms that SRL has. The link to SRL is a sticky in this forum. Feedback appreciated.

Note that I tried to make this as simple as possible, theres no great bells and whistles really that a great powerminer should have, such as Wizzups, but I made it more for fun because I hadn’t scripted in a long time.

[code]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = Powerminer

Author = Bego

Description = Powermines all ores

Version = 2.5

Date = July 02, 2006, 8:30 PM

Comments = Do the setup!

/Script Info}{
__ _ _ _
/ \ ___ _ __()_ __ | |_ | |__ _ _ _
\ \ / | '| | '_ | | | ’ | | | |()
\ \ (_| | | | |) | | | |) | || | _
_/___|| || .__/ _| |.__/ _, |()
|| |___/

               ____         }const{
              /\  _`\
              \ \ \ \ \     __     __     ___
               \ \  _ <'  /'__`\ /'_ `\  / __`\
                \ \ \ \ \/\  __//\ \ \ \/\ \ \ \
                 \ \____/\ \____\ \____ \ \____/
                  \/___/  \/____/\/___ \ \/___/
                                   /\____/
                                   \_/__/
               ////////////////////////////////////
               //       Powerminer by Bego       //
               //     COMPLIANT WITH SRL 2.4!    //
               //         Instructions:          //
               //      1.  Weild your pick!      //
               //       2.  Do the setup!        //
               // 3. If there isn't a big enough //
               //   number of players, make them //
               //   yourself in the array!       //
               //      4. Run the script!        //
               ////////////////////////////////////
               //             NOTE...            //
               //If you only have one character, //
               //  thats alright as it will not  //
               //       switch characters!       //
               //                                //
               // If your pickaxe isn't weilded, //
               //    the script will drop it!    //
               ////////////////////////////////////
               //         CREDITS GO TO          //
               //    WhiteShadow, Cheesehunk,    //
               //      phantombmx, and Pyro      //
               ////////////////////////////////////

{/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}
{/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}
{//////////////////////////////SETUP//////////////////////////////////}
{/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}
{/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}
{//} StartPlayer = 0; {0 is 1, 1 is 2, player to start with} {//}
{//} Users = 1; {How many users do you have in your army?} {//}
{//} RockColor = 4153991; {Color of the rock your mining} {//}
{//} TimesToDrop = 5; {Times to drop a load of ore until change} {//}
{//} RunAway = ‘N’; {Way to run away from a fight} {//}
{//} WaitTo = 15; {Max time while mining a rock in seconds} {//}
{//} TimesTill = 3; {Times to drop a load of ore until user switch}{//}
{//} User1Username = ‘’; {Below is self explanatory!} {//}
{//} User1Password = ‘’; {//}
{//} User1Nickname = ‘’; {//}
{//} {//}
{//} User2Username = ‘’; {//}
{//} User2Password = ‘’; {//}
{//} User2Nickname = ‘’; {//}
{/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}
{/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}
{//////////////////////////////END OF SETUP///////////////////////////}
{/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}
{/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}
{}
{DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE}
{**}
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/Mining.scar}
var
i, droptimes : integer;

procedure ProgReport;
var
RHours, Minutes, Seconds, RMinutes, RSeconds : LongInt;
Time : string;
begin
Seconds:=(GetSystemTime-ST) div 1000;
Minutes:=Seconds div 60;
RHours:=Minutes div 60;
Time:=inttostr(Seconds)+’ Seconds’;
if Minutes<>0 then
begin
RSeconds:=Seconds Mod (Minutes60);
Time:=inttostr(Minutes)+’ Minutes and ‘+inttostr(RSeconds)+’ Seconds’;
end;
if RHours<>0 then
begin
RMinutes:=Minutes Mod (RHours60);
RSeconds:=Seconds Mod (Minutes*60);
Time:=inttostr(RHours)+’ Hours, ‘+inttostr(RMinutes)+’ Minutes and ’
+inttostr(RSeconds)+’ Seconds’;
end;
begin
writeln (’’);
writeln (’===============POWERMINER BY BEGO==============’);
writeln (’’);
writeln (’ Worked for: ‘+Time);
writeln (’ Dropped ‘+inttostr(droptimes)+’ loads of ore’);
writeln (’’);
writeln (’===============POWERMINER BY BEGO===============’);
writeln (’’);
end;
end;

procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := Users;
CurrentPlayer := StartPlayer;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);

Players[0].Name := User1Username;
Players[0].Pass := User1Password;
Players[0].Nick := User1Nickname;
Players[0].Active := True;

Players[1].Name := User2Username;
Players[1].Pass := User2Password;
Players[1].Nick := User2Nickname;
Players[1].Active := True;
end;

procedure DeclareGlobals;
begin
BenMouse := false;
end;

procedure AntiRandoms;
var
x, y : integer;
begin
GasColors(x, y);
FindNormalRandoms;
FindPick;
if (Findfight = true) then
begin
SetRun(true);
RunAwayDirection(RunAway);
Wait(3000 + Random(1000));
RunBack;
end;
end;

procedure LetRockDie(RockX, RockY, RockColor, ColorTol, MaxSeconds: Integer); //By phantombmx
var rox, roy, rrtime: Integer;
begin
MarkTime(rrtime);
repeat
Wait(500 + random(50));
AntiRandoms;
FindNormalRandoms;
until(not(FindColorTolerance(rox, roy, RockColor, RockX - 1, RockY - 1, RockX + 1, RockY + 1, ColorTol)))or
(TimeFromMark(rrtime) >= MaxSeconds * 1000)
end;

procedure MineRocks;
var
x, y : integer;
begin
AntiRandoms;
repeat
MarkTime(Mark);
if (not(LoggedIn)) then break;
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, RockColor, 9, 8, 510, 335, 4))then
begin
if (TimeFromMark(Mark)>60000) then
begin
Logout;
Exit;
end;
AntiRandoms;
Mouse(x, y, 3, 3, true);
Flag;
Wait(500);
GetMousePos(x, y);
AntiRandoms;
LetRockDie(x, y, RockColor, 4, WaitTo);
end else
begin
MineRocks;
end;
until(InvFull);
AntiRandoms;
end;

procedure DropOres;
begin
if (i = 0) then
begin
Writeln(‘I hope you equiped your pickaxe…’);
Writeln(‘because its dropping everything in inventory…’);
i := i + 1;
end;
AntiRandoms;
DropAll;
AntiRandoms;
end;

Procedure NoName;
begin
if (LoggedIn) then
begin
SetChat(‘off’,3);
repeat
Wait(1000);
FindNormalRandoms;
AntiRandoms;
until(not(LoggedIn));
NextPlayer(True);
droptimes := 0;
end;
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
GetApplication.Minimize;
ActivateClient;
DeclarePlayers;
DeclareGlobals;
if(not(loggedin)) then
begin
loginplayer;
end;
FindPickHeadColor;
i := 0;
repeat
AntiRandoms;
MineRocks;
HoverSkill(‘mining’, false);
GameTab(4);
PickUpMouse;
AntiRandoms;
DropOres;
droptimes := droptimes + 1;
ProgReport;
AntiRandoms;
if (not(users = 1)) and
(droptimes = timestodrop) then
begin
NoName;
end else
if (not(Loggedin)) and (users = 1) then loginplayer;
if (not(loggedin)) and (not(users = 1)) then nextplayer(true);
until(False);
Writeln(‘Script done… somehow :O!!’);
end.[/code]

Read full topic
